summary: This document is a billing statement from AT&T Wireless for the account of Martin Golick, detailing monthly charges, payments, and usage for the billing cycle ending on March 14, 2004. It includes information on service charges, taxes, and a summary of voice usage. This document details the voice usage and call records associated with the phone number (561) 379-7824, including various calls made to and from different numbers, primarily in the Palm Beach area. It includes information on call durations, types, and charges incurred, indicating frequent communication patterns. This document details the voice and data usage for the phone number (561) 379-7824, associated with Martin Golick. It includes call logs, charges, and message retrievals, indicating frequent communication patterns and billing details.
